nodes.text: Kintoni was a planet in the Outer Rim Territories that contained a single city with several towns, the rest being farmland. It contained Tinegris Street. New Republic forces occupied a former Imperial garrison on Kintoni circa 4 ABY, where Governor Barkale was held prisoner. Mara Jade infiltrated the base and assassinated Barkale on the behalf of Palpatine for stealing credits over the past ten years.
